scripts.build:alerting: npm run prebuild && tsc --project tsconfig.alerting.json && tsc-alias && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:analytics: npm run prebuild && tsc --project tsconfig.analytics.json && tsc-alias && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:api: npm run prebuild && tsc --project tsconfig.api.json && tsc-alias && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:websocket: npm run prebuild && tsc --project tsconfig.websocket.json && tsc-alias && npm run postbuild
scripts.buildZip:alerting: npm run build:alerting && npm run zip:alerting
scripts.buildZip:analytics: npm run build:analytics && npm run zip:analytics
scripts.buildZip:api: npm run build:api && npm run zip:api
scripts.buildZip:websocket: npm run build:websocket && npm run zip:websocket
scripts.postbuild: cp package*.json dist && cd dist && npm ci --omit=dev
scripts.zip:alerting: cd dist && zip gitgazer-alerting.zip -qr * && mkdir -p ../tmp && mv gitgazer-alerting.zip ../tmp/
scripts.zip:analytics: cd dist && zip gitgazer-analytics.zip -qr * && mkdir -p ../tmp && mv gitgazer-analytics.zip ../tmp/
scripts.zip:api: cd dist && zip gitgazer-api.zip -qr * && mkdir -p ../tmp && mv gitgazer-api.zip ../tmp/
scripts.zip:websocket: cd dist && zip gitgazer-websocket.zip -qr * && mkdir -p ../tmp && mv gitgazer-websocket.zip ../tmp/
